thread.section_title: FlightNetwork.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightNetwork.com | www.flightnetwork.com
thread.title: Donna Sullivan

author: Donna Sullivan
title: Donna Sullivan
text: I booked flight through a return on a Kayak search. Booking went through easy enough. The only issue was that the alert that said order was processing, and might take a few minutes, never went away. I got my email confirmation of the completed transaction and that screen was still up. It did not cause me any issues though and I'd use the service again, as they offered the best price.
